feed.title: 2000 Class Association
feed.subtitle: The 2000 Class Association is the official association for the 2000 sailing dinghy. The 2000, previously known as the Laser 2000, is an entry-level performance assymmetric sailing dinghy. The boat is sailed by serious racers and families alike.

entry.title: 2021 Events Programme published
entry.content:
Rob Burridge has finalised the 2021 events programme encompassing

*Millennium Open Series

*Northern Series

*Coached Open meetings

*National Championships

All events are now detailed on the Events page. Check them out and start pencilling in the ones you want to do, assuming you canâ€™t make them all!
